page.title: 19LEISURE IN LOWESTOFT
page.content: There are many leisure amenities in Lowestoft as it is visited by plenty of tourists. On the beach there are two piers with amusements and cafes. There are bingo halls and small fairgrounds nearby as well as hot food takeaway shops, restaurants, pubs and cafes. In Kensington Gardens there are some tennis courts, a bowling green and a boating lake. People often come at weekends rather than for a long stay, in fact the 3 star Victoria Hotel has recently been up for sale and is now used for meetings and conferences by business people. Along London Road South there are guest houses, hotels and flats. In the area there are also youth clubs, night clubs and a yacht club.
